text: Ussurella is a monotypic beetle genus in the family Cerambycidae described by Mikhail Leontievich Danilevsky in 1997. Its only species, Ussurella napolovi, was first described by the same author two years earlier in the genus Ussuria, but that genus name was preoccupied by an ammonite.BioLib.cz - Ussurella napolovi. Retrieved 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1995
title: Ussurella napolovi
